item.title: Huge amount of discarded items, 3rd October
item.description:
This very strange pile of rubbish (dirty pram/old signs/pallets) is around 5ft tall/wide. A group of men congregate at it at night and conduct in illegal behaviours. The pile may well be a make-shift shack. Blocks the pavement and is unstable.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Frederick Terrace, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress, cannisters and sleeping bag dumped by bike storage unit outside 9, 72 Grove Lane, 3rd October
item.description:
Mattress reported dumped by cycle storage outside flat 9, 72 Grove Lane. Reported previously and reply said it had been dealt with but it is still there. Now some kind of cannister have been added to it. Again reported and said, incorrectly, that it's been cleared but it is still there. A sleeping bag and other rubbish has now been added to it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Cutcombe Road, Loughborough Junction, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Like bike blocks entire pavement, 3rd October
item.description:
